mechanics.condition: Creature's speed is being determined or modified
mechanics.outcome: Creature's speed becomes 0 AND Creature cannot benefit from any bonus to its speed
Grappled condition ends for the grappled creature

mechanics.trigger: An effect is applied to the grappled creature
mechanics.condition: Effect removes the grappled creature from the reach of the grappler OR grappling effect
mechanics.outcome: Grappled condition ends for the grappled creature

description_text: A grappled creature's speed becomes 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed. The condition ends if the grappler is incapacitated (see the condition). The condition also ends if an effect removes the grappled creature from the reach of the grappler or grappling effect, such as when a creature is hurled away by the thunderwave spell.
